alert.note: Alert for Dane; Green; Rock (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 05 at 1:46PM CDT until July 05 at 2:15PM CDT by NWS Milwaukee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Milwaukee/Sullivan has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Green County in south central Wisconsin... Northwestern Rock County in south central Wisconsin... Southeastern Dane County in south central Wisconsin... * Until 215 PM CDT. * At 146 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Brooklyn, or near Evansville, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Stoughton, Evansville, Brooklyn, Fulton, and Cooksville. People attending The Stoughton Junior Fair should seek safe shelter immediately! HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
